column4: what are the equivalent commands of Gentoo's rc-update and rc-status?
I want to stop gdm automatically starting at boot.  I am only really familar with the rc commands
do you still need help with that?
I made it such that runlevel 2 is without gdm and runlevel 3 is with gdm
so I can set the default runlevel to 2, and 'telinit 3' if I want gdm
there's a nice program called 'sysv-rc-conf' which edits the contents of each runlevel
